subject: Your Yahoo verification code is BNCBFDKZ
body:
Hi Danny,

If so, use this code to finish signing in.

Device : chrome, windows nt
When : 10 November, 2022 11:01:08 AM PDT
Where*: Pennsylvania, United States


Didn't sign in recently?
Review your account activity and remove the devices and apps that you don't recognise.https://login.yahoo.com/account/activity

Thanks,
Yahoo

We will never ask you for your password in an email. If you don?t trust a link in an email, go directly to the normal sign-in page via yahoo.com.

*Location is approximate based on the IP address from which it originated.

subject: Call for Papers
body:
Dear Authors,

The 24th International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Processing Techniques and Applications(PDPTA'23)

https://americancse.org/events/csce2023/conferences/pdpta23
July 30 - August 2, 2023, Luxor (MGM), Las Vegas, USA

CALL FOR PAPERS
LATE BREAKING PAPERS, POSITION PAPERS, ABSTRACTS, POSTERS

Paper Submission Deadline: February 31, 2023
11:59pm USA Eastern Time zone (EDT)
CONTACT:
Questions and inquiries should be sent to:
CSCE'23 Conference Secretariat: cs@americancse.edu

subject: Up to 70% off for our 70th anniversary
body:
70 YEARS OF APPRECIATION UP TO 70% OFF


When we look back through 70 years of adidas history, we recognize that it's creators like you
who have helped shape our brand. The gratitude celebration continues with select items up to 70% off.
Also, Creators Club members get double points on purchases online and in-store through January 10.
